description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The world is being overrun by the XOID armies who will strip the planet of resources and leave it in ruin. Defend your position, upgrade your units and Stop the XOID! v0.1.1 BETA
